name: Brunch Eggs
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: (1 lb.) pkg. Wilson's pork sausage, browned and drained
slices white bread, cubed, without crusts

instructions: Mix eggs, milk, and mustard. Gently add other ingredients to the mixture. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 inch cake pan. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350Â° for 45 minutes.
